titles.title: For the relief of Jozef Richard Madar, Etela Madar, and Jozef Thomas Madar.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/4/1997--Introduced. Declares three named individuals to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
